text: Meadowbank can refer to: ;Australia * Meadowbank, New South Wales ;Canada * Meadowbank, Prince Edward Island, a community in Prince Edward Island * Meadowbank Aerodrome, Nunavut * Meadowbank Gold Mine, Nunavut ;England * Meadowbank, Cheshire ;New Zealand * Meadowbank, New Zealand, a suburb of Auckland ;Scotland * Meadowbank, Edinburgh ** Meadowbank Stadium, Edinburgh ** Old Meadowbank, a now-demolished stadium in Edinburgh ** New Meadowbank, a now-demolished stadium in Edinburgh ** Meadowbank Thistle F.C., a Scottish football club that existed from 1974 to 1995
title: Meadowbank
